DOC.brief_summary: The aim study understand clinical characteristic Taiwanese eat disorder well establishment psychometric property eat disorder-related questionnaire ( EDI BITE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Cross-Cultural Validity EDI-1 Among Clinical Non-Clinical Taiwanese Population
DOC.detailed_description: The study subject include three group population : 1st group non-clinical nursing college student ( N=800 ) ; 2nd group clinical eat disorder patient ( N=600 ) 3rd group age- , sex-matched clinical non-eating disorder patient ( N=600 ) . Clinical patient screen eat disorder module SCID group eat disorder non-eating disorder group . After write informed consent , eat disorder patient receive clinical assessment include important clinical characteristic psychopathology eat disorder experience senior psychiatrist . All clinical patient ask complete self-rating scale include eat general psychological functioning questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: patient eat disorder , patient noneating disorder , nurse school student
